directions: Combine salsa and dressing in a mixing bowl.
Cook Green Giant® Broccoli & Cheese Veggie Tots™ according to package directions.
Serve dip with hot Green Giant® Broccoli & Cheese Veggie Tots™.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) package Green Giant™ Broccoli & Cheese Veggie Tots
title: Broccoli & Cheese Veggie Tots with Salsa Ranch Dip
